CORPORATE INFO 

## 1) Where is VCI Global Limited headquartered?

VCI Global Limited is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia with its business address at B03-C-8, Menara 3A, KL Eco City, No. 3, Jalan Bangsar, 59200 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

## 2) Where can I get more information on VCI Global Limited?

This [corporate information](https://v-capital.co/about_us) page contains a variety of information regarding our company.

## 3) Who are the members of VCI Global Limited's Board of Directors and Management Team?

Learn more about [our personnel.](/bod/)

## 4) Who is VCI Global Limited's legal counsel?

Sichenzia Ross Ference Carmel LLP.

## 5) Who is VCI Global Limited's independent auditor?

WWC, P.C.

## 6) Who is VCI Global Limited's transfer agent?

Vstock Transfer, LLC., and they can be reached at: Vstock Transfer, LLC.18 Lafayette PlaceWoodmere, NY 11598.Tel.: 212-828-8436Email: info@vstocktransfer.comWeb: [Vstock Transfer](https://www.vstocktransfer.com/home)

## 7) How do I contact VCI Global Limited's Investor Relations?

Please see [IR Contact.](/ir_contact/)

STOCK 

## 1) What exchange does VCI Global Limited's stock trade on?

Our stock is traded on the NASDAQ Capital Market under the ticker symbol “VCIG”.

## 2) Does VCI Global Limited distribute dividends?

Yes, our dividend policy is to distribute to our shareholders surplus funds from its distributable profits and/or general reserves. Learn more about our [Dividend Policy.](/governance_document/)

## 3) When was VCI Global Limited's initial public offering (IPO) and what was the offering price?

VCI Global Limited went public on April 13, 2023 at $4.00 per share.

## 4) Can I purchase stock directly from VCI Global Limited?

No, but our stock can be purchased through just about any brokerage firm.

## 5) When should I contact VCI Global Limited's transfer agent?

If you are a registered shareholder, our transfer agent can assist in a variety of shareholder-related matters including:

  * change of address
  * change of name
  * transfer of stock ownership
  * lost or missing stock certificate(s) request
  * account statement request

If you own shares through a brokerage firm, please contact your brokerage firm directly. Our transfer agent can be reached at: Vstock Transfer, LLC 18 Lafayette Place Woodmere, NY 11598. Tel.: 212-828-8436 Email: info@vstocktransfer.com Web: [Vstock Transfer](https://www.vstocktransfer.com/home)

FINANCIAL 

## 1) How do I get a copy of the Annual Report?

Our most recent Form 20-F is available on our [SEC Filings](/sec_filings/) page.

## 2) What is VCI Global Limited's fiscal year?

Our fiscal year is based on the calendar year - the last day of our fiscal year is December 31.

## 3) How can I obtain copies of financial information from VCI Global Limited?

You can go to the [SEC Filings](/sec_filings/) page to view and/or download the relevant filings. These reports are also available on the [SEC website.](https://www.sec.gov/edgar/browse/?CIK=0001930510)
